name: Ayrd-ash
description:
This game was made for: "My First Game Jam: Winter 2022".

https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2022

This game was made in approximately 7 days (last week of the game jam).

*This game is also technically unfinished. But as of finishing my submission, I need a break XD.*

Ayrd-ash is an ancient tale about people who could control wind. You are a descendant of such powers, and you go in search of lost history.

Note (in the event in-game instructions aren't clear):

A & D = LEFT & RIGHT

SPACE = JUMP

O = DASH

Tools Used:

Pygame 2: https://www.pygame.org

MS Paint

BeepBox: https://www.beepbox.co

SFXR = https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
